thread.title: PriceSpider’s Director of Engineering, Steve Sheldon, Leads Charge Toward New E-Commerce Opportunities for Brand Manufacturers

author: cnbc.com
title: PriceSpider’s Director of Engineering, Steve Sheldon, Leads Charge Toward New E-Commerce Opportunities for Brand Manufacturers
text:
IRVINE, Calif., May 29, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PriceSpider —an industry pioneer in creating advanced retail technology solutions for brand manufacturers and retailers—is pleased to announce that its director of engineering, Steve Sheldon, is leading the company’s talented team of engineers in developing ground-breaking new advancements to its next-generation of e-commerce software solutions. A 20-year veteran of the technology industry – nine of which were spent with tech giant, Microsoft – Sheldon continues to develop robust e-commerce solutions as demand among manufacturers is at an all-time high for PriceSpider’s cutting-edge, sales-optimizing solutions. His responsibilities expand the capability and effectiveness of PriceSpider’s engineering team and platforms—maximizing value for its customers.
“After spending years at one of the world’s most technologically-advanced software providers, Steve continues to offer expertise and insight unrivaled within the e-commerce software space,” said Anthony Ferry, co-founder and CEO of PriceSpider. “His dynamic vision has been key to the development of new and enhanced products for our customers, pushing beyond the boundaries of product efficiency during this high-growth period.”
As manufacturers seek technology to help maximize the value of their e-commerce channels, Fortune 500 companies, multinational manufacturers and forward-thinking brands continue to profit from the use of PriceSpider’s content monitoring and branding solutions, which has catapulted the brand into double digit growth. Sheldon’s know-how and expertise has helped position PriceSpider as an industry pace-setter while also increasing efficiencies.
Sheldon joined PriceSpider after cultivating an impeccable reputation in the tech industry, overseeing the design of globally-recognized program applications such as the Microsoft Office Suite as well as software development at Macromedia and Articulate. Instrumental to PriceSpider’s software creation and implementation process, Sheldon is currently enhancing MAP Guard , developing a high-powered version of PriceSpider’s Brand Monitor solution and examining how the Where to Buy solution can bring new value to manufacturers.
To learn more about PriceSpider’s e-commerce software solutions, please visit www.PriceSpider.com .
About PriceSpider: PriceSpider is the world’s leading conversion platform specializing in retail technology products and solutions that provide invaluable insight into consumer purchasing behavior. A partner to many of the world’s largest brands, PriceSpider is powered by proprietary “spidering” technology that collects a wide range of data from thousands of e-commerce sites. Connecting the dots between brands, retailers and shoppers, PriceSpider provides essential information on what, where, when and how people purchase. From conversion data capture to dashboards that analyze retailer and brand performance, pricing and competitor posture, PriceSpider gives companies real-time omni-channel visibility, actionable data-backed insights and practical recommendations that help clients “know more” so they can “sell more.” Connect with PriceSpider on Facebook , Twitter and LinkedIn . For more information, please visit www.PriceSpider.com .
